name: NFT Destroyer
description:
This is going to be a little less formal. I was working on a 3D stealth game about burning NFTs, but that came to a standstill. I still wanted to use the "NFT" generation system I made for that project, so I repackaged it into an idle Cookie Clicker-esque game!

And for those of you wondering, all "NFTs" are not actually real, but are instead randomly generated combinations of my own art assets. Enjoy :)

Controls:

Left Mouse: Throw match

Esc: Pause
